mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_visa_comment ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, admin_user_id, visa_id, content) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{adminUserId}, #{visaId}, #{content});
mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, admin_user_id AS adminUserId, visa_id AS visaId, content FROM b_visa_comment WHERE visa_id = #{visaId} ORDER BY gmt_create ASC;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_visa_comment WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
